tuv.seg: (you can use an existing GameMaker:Studio marketplace certificate)
(你可以使用已有的 GameMaker:Studio 市场证书)
Are you sure you want to cut the selected event?
确定要剪切选中的事件吗？
Are you sure you want to delete configuration '{0}'?
Are you sure you want to delete this layout?
确定要删除这个布局吗？
Are you sure you want to remove the event with all its actions?
确定要移除这个事件，包括它所有的动作吗？
Are you sure you want to remove {0} events with all their actions?
确定要移除 {0} 事件，包括它所有的动作吗？
Are you sure you want to reset the layout?
Attempted to add gadget '{0}' to toolbox but it isn't registered with the layout manager
尝试添加一个组件 '{0}' 到工具栏中，但它未在布局管理器中注册
Attempted to load cursor {1} but received error '{0}'
尝试载入光标{1} ，但收到错误 '{0}'
Attempted to load gadget toolbox info but received error '{0}' - '{1}'
尝试载入组件工具栏信息，但收到错误 '{0}' - '{1}'
Attempting to access invalid column index {0} for grid with {1} columns
尝试访问无效的列索引 {0}，因为网格只有{1}列。
Attempting to access invalid row index {0} for grid with {1} rows
尝试访问无效的行索引 {0}，因为网格只有{1} 行。
Attempting to add a cursor using image {1} with duplicated id {0} please assign a different name
尝试添加存在重复id {0}的图片{1}作为光标。请指定一个不同的名称。
Attempting to load cursor {0} but can't find loading info
尝试载入光标{0}，但找不到加载信息
Below you can find details of each licence type.
下面是每一种许可证的详细说明。
Cannot create configurations with the Trial version of GameMaker Studio 2
无法使用GameMaker Studio 2试用版创建配置
现有的配置名称不能重复?
Certificate file '{0}' already exists; please choose a new filename
证书文件 '{0}' 已经存在；请选项一个新的文件名
Check that the password is valid for the selected certficate file
检测密码对于证书是否有效
Default choice for resetting the project layout
重置项目布局的默认选项
Deleting configuration '{0}' will also delete the following configurations: '{1}'.
删除配置 '{0}' 的同时也会删除下面的配置： '{1}'.
对话框编辑器：复制布局名称
Dialog Editor: Failed to open .json file: '{0}'
对话框编辑器： .json 文件 '{0}' 打开失败
Dialog Editor: No JSON File Selected
对话框编辑器：没有选中的JSON文件
对话框编辑器：没有选中的布局
Dialog Editor: No XML File Selected
对话框编辑器：没有选中的XML文件
Dialog Editor: Save failed due to error: {0} - {1}
对话框编辑器：保存失败是由于错误：{0} - {1}
ERROR: Project failed to compile: error code {0}
错误: 项目编译失败：错误代码 {0}
ERROR: Project failed to deploy: error code {0}
错误：项目发布失败。错误代码 {0}
ERROR: Project failed to run: error code {0}
错误：项目运行失败：错误代码{0}
输入新的证书的详细信息︰
If the file doesn't already contain the style definition it will search all files within its folder.\nUse 'Save Style As...' to explicitly override save file
如果这个文件中不包含样式定义，它将查找文件夹中的所有文件。\n可以直接使用“样式另存为”重写保存的文件。
If you don't have a certificate, you can create one:
如果没有证书，请创建一个：
It will append to the selected file unless an alternative is selected.
它将追加到所选的文件中，除非有其它选择?。
Name and Password fields must be set
名称和密码字段必须设置
New configuration name cannot be empty
Password is NOT valid for certificate
Promoting a configuration cannot be undone
提升一个配置的操作不能撤消Promoting a configuration cannot be undone
Resetting the project layout will close any open resources.
重置项目布局将关闭所有打开的资源。
Revert All Styles To Last Save
将所有样式还原为最后一次保存的样式
Revert All Styles To Original State
还原所有样式为最初的状态
还原为上次保存的样式
Select the file to save the style to.
选择要保存样式的文件：
设置.pem 证书文件和密码
选项卡控件面板Tab Control Panel
The configuration name '{0}' is not valid
The style '{0}' is not a valid json primitive.
样式'{0}' 不是原始的有效的 json?。

The style name '{0}' is currently registered to
'{2}'
but will now be saved to
'{1}'

样式名称 '{0}' 当前注册给
'{2}'
但是现在将保存到
'{1}'
The style wasn't found in this folder.
文件夹中没有发现样式文件。
The transition specified '{0}' is not valid
There are no breakpoints to display.\nTo place one, press F9 on the desired line in a code editor.
没有显示断点。\n如果需要设置，请在代码编辑器指定行按F9。
There are no compile errors to show!
There are various different licence types that you can get for <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>, the choice of which will depend largely on the audience that you want to target.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>有许多不同的许可证类型，选择哪一个在于导出平台的受众是什么。
To display this page you need a browser with JavaScript support.
要显示此页，您需要浏览器的 JavaScript 支持。
Type in the keyword to find:
Type in the word(s) to search for:
XXXX<-分隔符，上面是要翻译的内容，下面是备注
You can not bind global inputs to a function that takes paramaters.
你不能绑定一个全局输入至一个带参数的函数上。You can not bind global inputs to a function that takes paramaters.
